Frameworks/Publishing-with-Obsidian---A-.title: Publishing Framework
Frameworks/Publishing-with-Obsidian---A-.content:
Use a separate Obsidian vault

Writing

All Articles go under a category#Books#Frameworks
Could have multiple sub folders as well


Start an article with state as Draft
Write article
Test  using

   npx quartz build --serve
   

Publishing
Using github profile repository website

Remove the tag draft before pushing the article on web
Create a build using

npx quartz build



Copy the generated html content from public/ to the publishing repository root

3. git add .
4. git commit -m "MESSAGE"
5. git push

Should start reflecting in sometime on the repository
